resources.string:
Click the Start button to play keyword spotting with Next-gen Kaldi. 
 


 The source code and pre-trained models are publicly available. Please see https://github.com/k2-fsa/sherpa-onnx for details.

Input your keywords here, one keyword per line.
Two example keywords are given below:

n ǐ h ǎo @你好
d àn g ē d àn g ē @蛋哥蛋哥
